mapper.select: /* OrderMapper.getOrderProductInfo */ SELECT ORDER_PRODUCT_NO , ORDER_NO , ORDER_QTY , MENU_BOARD_SEQ , MENU_DAY , MENU_MSG , PAY_AMT , DELIVERY_TYPE , USED_POINT , CONFIRM_DT , REG_USER , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM ORDER_PRODUCT WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(A.ORDER_PAY_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND A.ORDER_STATUS = '0000' THEN 1 END) AS NEW_ORDER_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.ORDER_STATUS = '1001' THEN 1 END) AS PAY_WAIT_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_MST A WHERE A.ORDER_STATUS = '0000' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DELIVERY_MST B WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND B.STATUS = '1000' AND DATE_FORMAT(B.MENU_DAY, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'))) AS TODAY_DELIV_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_MST A WHERE A.ORDER_STATUS = '0000' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DELIVERY_MST B WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND B.STATUS = '1000' AND DATE_FORMAT(B.MENU_DAY, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY))) AS NEXT_DELIV_CNT FROM ORDER_MST A
